documentation.text:
@title FileRegistry
 @dev Manages decentralized file ownership and sharing permissions for Reverie Vault.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct FileRegistry.FileRecord storage ref)
mapping(string memory => struct FileRegistry.FileRecord storage ref)

documentation.text:
@dev Anchors a file to the blockchain. 
 This is the "Proof of Existence" for the file.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct FileRegistry.FileRecord storage ref)

documentation.text: @dev Shares access to a file with another wallet.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct FileRegistry.FileRecord storage ref)

documentation.text: @dev Revokes access from a previously shared user.

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct FileRegistry.FileRecord storage ref)

documentation.text: @dev Checks if a user (caller) has access to a specific file.
